title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: It is to be inferred that this is a joke which got into the head of one Scotchman without a sur gical operation. John Home was born on the east side of Quality Street, near Bernard Street, Leith, in a house no longer standing. He was educated in the grammar- school of his native town, and at the University of Edinburgh.

title: A journey from Edinburgh through parts of North Britain:
author: Campbell, Alexander
